original_text: Jesus said to her, ‘I have authority over death. I raise dead people, and I give people true life. Anyone who believes in me will live. Even if that person dies, he will continue to live.
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 나는 부활이요 생명이니 나를 믿는 자는 죽어도 살겠고

sentences.korean_translation: 나는 죽음에 대한 권위를 가지고 있다

sentences.original_text: and I give people true life
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나에게 사람들에게 참된 생명을 준다

sentences.original_text: Anyone who believes in me will live
sentences.korean_translation: 나를 믿는 모든 사람은 살 것이다
